metadata.title: Agent Changelog - Pantry Directory Organization and Handoff

actions_taken: Reviewed and implemented app-centric structure for kitchen/pantry/ingredients/.
Created subfolders for base, automatic1111, comfyui, n8n, penpot, openwebui, each with tools, skills, tasks, modules.
Moved ingredient files to appropriate subfolders.
Removed old empty directories, ensuring no directories with files were deleted.
Archived previous handoff and changelog files to agents/ARCHIVE/2025/07/.
Created new handoff file with clear next steps for the next agent.
issues_found: Some legacy or scattered files may remain in kitchen/pantry/ingredients/.
Next agent should audit and finalize the organization.
next_steps: Next agent to audit all files, move any remaining files to correct locations, and update documentation as needed.
